Class ItemBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.neo.twistapi.ItemBuilder
public class ItemBuilder extends Object
Class that houses the methods for the ItemBuilder builder

      public ItemBuilder addEnchantment(String enchant, int level)
      Will try to fail silently if Enchant name is incorrect
      Parameters:
      enchant - The String of the enchantment to add to the item List of Enchants
      level - The Level of the applied Enchant
      Returns:
      Instance of ItemBuilder

    • setDurability

      public ItemBuilder setDurability(int durability)
      Sets the duribility (damage) of an item. Will fail silently if the item cannot be damaged.
      Parameters:
      durability - The value of durability. 0 being full durability.
      Returns:
      Instance of ItemBuilder

    • addAttributeModifier

      public ItemBuilder addAttributeModifier(String attribute, UUID uuid, String name, double amount, String operation, String slot)
      Parameters:
      attribute - The Attribute to add
      uuid - The String of the UUID of the attribute
      name - The Name of the Attribute Modifier (Can be anything)
      amount - The Amount to add/multipy by
      operation - The types of Attribute Modifier Operations
      slot - The Equipment Slot to use
      Returns:
      Instance of ItemBuilder

    • setUnbreakable

      public ItemBuilder setUnbreakable(boolean unbreakable)
      Parameters:
      unbreakable - Boolean for if the item should be unbreakable. Only use this method to add unbreakability as it is false by default
      Returns:
      Instance of ItemBuilder

      Adds a persistent data container
      Parameters:
      key - The String value of a NamespacedKey
      type - The type of PersistentDataType to use
      value - The value of the persistent data container using the specified key and type
      Returns:
      Instance of ItemBuilder
